Question: Linear Search
Beginner Approach: Check each element one by one

Question: Why Searching Needs Sorted Arrays
Beginner Approach: Try binary search & see failure on unsorted
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Sort array or use hashing when allowed

Question: Basic Binary Search (Find element)
Beginner Approach: Use low, high, mid and compare

Question: Order-Agnostic Binary Search
Beginner Approach: Try both ascending and descending by checking order
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Detect sort order ? apply binary search

Question: First and Last Occurrence
Beginner Approach: Linear scan to find all positions
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Lower bound / Upper bound using binary search

Question: Peak Element (Mountain Array)
Beginner Approach: Scan to find peak via brute force

Question: Minimum Capacity / Threshold Problems
Beginner Approach: Try all capacities to check feasibility
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Binary Search on Answer + feasibility function

Question: Koko Eating Bananas / Painters Partition
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Binary Search on Answer + monotonic check
